banishing.name: Banishing
description: Any single elemental within range
is banished from this plane of existence.

brilliance.name: Brilliance
description: Target gains 2 Intelligence per Rank of the spell.
May only be cast once on each target.

charming.name: Charming
description: Charms one enemy, causing it to fight for
the party for the remainder of the battle
or until it is killed.
Does not affect undead or certain other types of creatures.

control_marquis.name: Control Marquis
description: Charms one Marquis, causing it to fight
for the party for the remainder of the battle
or until it is killed.

endurance.name: Endurance
description: Target gains 2 Endurance for each Rank of the spell.
May only be cast once on each target.

sense_aura.name: Sense Aura
description: Reveals a variety of information about the target:
the higher the caster's rank in Sense Aura,
the more information is revealed.
May only be cast once on each target.

stupidity.name: Stupidity
description: Target loses 2 Intelligence per Rank of the spell.
May only be cast once on each target.

teleportation.name: Teleportation
description: Caster teleports to a chosen point on the battlefield.

weakness.name: Weakness
description: Target loses 2 Endurance for each Rank of the spell.
May only be cast once on each target.
